reviewText: I agree with the person's review before mine this is a fabulous show did see it several times wished it was in u.s. format have decided to order it anyway and I'm going to try to figure out how to play it here

Why isn't this DVD in a format for the US? I saw this show twice when it was in New York several years ago and bought the CD. The music was beautiful as was the show. It is not a "typical" clown show but if you want something a little different, something that will make you smile as opposed to laughing out loud then you'd enjoy this. I don't know if Slava is still performing but, if he is, I'd pay to see this same show again.
